entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDBFS undefined issue! #77329
  • JsonConverter.Read/WriteAsPropertyName methods throw NotSupportedException when invoked in built-in converters #77326
    8.0.0
  • .NET RC 2: EnableLLVM=true causes exception in MAUI app on Android #77319
    7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for `DebuggerStepThrough` attribute #77318
    8.0.0
  • [wasm[debugger] Support `DebuggerTypeProxyAttribute(string)` #77315
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Non-flowing AsyncLocal<T> values similar to the illogical parts of CallContext #77314
  • HttpClientFactory logging improvements #77312
    Future
  • Post build events and the VS publish wizard #77311
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync usability #77310
    Future
  • Validate that the new snake/kebab case naming policies match the Json.NET implementation. #77309
    8.0.0
  • 0.5% customers will fail to Start my App when run as Windows Service #77327
  • Expose information about JsonPropertyInfo being readable/writable #77307
    8.0.0
  • Expose ElementType and KeyType #77306
    8.0.0
  • TarFile fails to extract even when symbolic link references into the output directory #77303
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #77300
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #77298
    8.0.0

Closed

  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #43869
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Multiply/IntMultiply/IntMultiply.sh #77299
    8.0.0
  • Fix CacheEntryExtensions.SetValue()'s signature to allow null values #77264
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Support consuming profile guided optimization data for optimization #6522
    Future
  • [NET 8.0] Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'CborWriter' could not be found #77296
  • New item doesn't add to the Cache when old item expired, when SizeLimit used #36122
    8.0.0
  • In net6 /net5 , when checking variable/property is string, and the property has null notation ?, the test is false. #77313
  • [libraries-pgo] BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set ... but is required because of the following tree #75827
    8.0.0
  • CI failure in Wasm Linux: Could not restore / could not find `Microsoft.NET.Workload.Mono.ToolChain.net7.Manifest-7.0.100/7.0.0-ci` #76908
    7.0.x
  • Follow up on mono toolchain workload PR feedback #73758
    8.0.0
  • Advanced multiple HTTP/2 connections support in SocketsHttpHandler #40391
    Future
  • Cannot get Header value back when it includes special chars. #22938
    Future
  • InvalidOperationException from HttpHeaders.CheckHeaderName when _invalidHeaders contains the header #21000
    Future
  • How I can set timeout to httpstream which I'm reading? #42733
    Future
  • Is HttpConnectionResponseContent.Content.ReadAsStringAsync() guaranteed to be re-runnable? #39218
    Future
  • Http response with Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding: chunked headers leads to wrong response string #34402
    6.0.8
  • [API Proposal]: add internal function `hostfxr_get_active_host_context()` #77091
  • MonoVM + DynamicMethod semantic compatibility break between net7 & net8 #77273
  • System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception (0x80090308): The token supplied to the function is invalid" when TLS13 is enabled #77124
  • `perf-pipeline` broken because of `Signature not valid in the specified time frame:` #77278
  • No runtime error raised while using Generics of an unreferenced class #75984

PullRequests

Created

  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Small improvements to get span item #77331
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix documentation for INumberBase IsComplex and IsImaginary #77330
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Always generate metadata for dynamic methods #77322
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Disable emitting Vector64 SIMD intrinsics on Amd64 #77320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update mask for lookup of `this` in CCW `ComWrappers` scenario #77302
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove some unnecessary path manipulation helpers #77301
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename COMPlus_ to DOTNET_ for IntMultipliy.csproj test #77321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `CacheEntryExtensions.SetValue()`'s signature to allow `null` values #77305
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #77323
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [tests][Android] ReAdd Android library test jobs #77280
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #76942
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Simplify DynamicMethod arg validation #77277
    area-System.Reflection
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77308
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove _fdopen from PAL #77272
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Clearing all cards for free regions #77224
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Disable inlining for constrained calls on gshared paramet… #77274
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • replace ToUtf8 with Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes #75834
    area-System.Text.Json, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Vector128 ConvertTo API's for Amd64 #77211
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Android][tests] Replace hardcoded /tmp path #77291
    area-System.IO
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] PoC: Use Java TrustManager to call RemoteCertificateValidationCallback in SslStream #77220
    NO-REVIEW, os-android
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy constructor selection #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] benchmark simple app without JSExport #76632
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Template nits 2 #77263
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #77269
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: leave targets #1990
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Can ref structs always be on the LLVM frame? #1880

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] double/float 64, RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds #2049
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: heap corruption #1984
  • [Green Threads] PInvokes do not swap to the OS stack #2018

PullRequests

Created

  • Transition to os thread on pinvoke #2053
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change test for canStoreArgOnLlvmStack to typGetObjLayout/HasGCPtr #2052

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Compat implements functionality for checking internal API but does not expose it #28712

Closed

  • Unable to build using <TargetFrameworks> tag on .NET 7 RC1 #28009
  • dotnet test fails on sdk 6.0.200 - System.AccessViolationException #24124
  • Error whilst uninstalling .NET 6 SDK - api-ms-win-core-path-l1-1-0.dll is missing #24347

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update current TFM #28715
    Area-ILLink
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Limit libstdc++ woraround to TFM <= net7.0 #28710
    Area-ILLink
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates

Updated

  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2026816 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE changes for 'ref fields' feature #64906
    17.5
  • Attribute properties are not suggested for local methods #64905
  • "Convert to method": `nameof` expression in attributes is converted to string literal #64904
    Backlog
  • TypeLoadException when declaring a task-like type as `ref struct` #64903
  • csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent breaks when awaiting a generic type #64902
  • Codefix for CS1997 uses `Task<T>` even if the original return type was not `Task` #64901
    Backlog
  • Eliminate state from CompletionService.ProviderManager #64898
    17.5
  • Reorder Tuple Members Refactoring #64897
  • Source Generators - make WriteTo public for Syntax classes #64894
  • Explicit interface member autocompletion does not work correctly when an attribute precedes the declaration #64891
    Backlog
  • Override autocompletion does not work correctly when an attribute precedes the declaration #64887
    Backlog

Closed

  • Support implementation edges for interfaces to types for cross-project/repo find references #59617
    17.4
  • Workspace reentrancy with SolutionCrawler and DiagnosticProvider #64681
  • Analyzer performance for disabled by default rules #64771
    17.5 P1
  • Integration tests timing out after 150 minutes #63772
    17.4
  • Add public methods to supress visibility checks for compilation #11149
    Backlog
  • For C#, the compiler should allow returning a single named value and suggest the name for a local variable #63870
  • (a, b) is (int? x, int y) can be circumvented with (a, b) is (var x, var y) #64239

PullRequests

Created

  • Save the resx file after a button is added into the WinForm #64910
    Area-IDE
  • Update discord link in readme #64909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add back async streaming of results for DesignerAttributes (part2) #64908
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce the packaged size of the LSIF generator #64907
    Area-IDE
  • Fix ProjectProperties #64900
    Area-IDE
  • Get binlog on constructor failure #64899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add back async streaming of results for NavTo (part2) #64896
    Area-IDE
  • Implement equality semantics for async tagger tags. (take2) #64895
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - while snippet #64893
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Ref safety analysis should take into consideration defensive copy of a call receiver performed by IL gen. #64890
    Area-Compilers
  • Workspace refs #64889
    Area-IDE
  • Clear build-only diagnostics in the document after document edit #64885
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P1
  • Expose a way to change the document service provider to Razor #64884
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add support for implementation edges in our LSIF indexer #64263
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add IOperation test where IObjectCreationOperation.Constructor is null #63092
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix color contrast for highlighted item #64843
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Log telemetry about what sort of sqlexceptions we're getting and how often we're disabling storage #64865
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional check to try to find later crash #64850
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Small analyzer performance fix for disabled by default rules #64772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64878
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64911
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow and emit `params` arrays in lambdas #64861
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove project-cache-service #64880
    Area-IDE
  • Account for delegate creation inside an explicitly-converted tuple expression #64882
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Support caller info and nullability attributes in lambdas #64823
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Foreach ref assignment without identity conversion should give error #64879
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • fix incorrect variable name #63663
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Verify the error type and span only for error tag #64852
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Add more analyzers #44690
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Kestrel picks a docker generated certificate 'in front' of a generated developer certificate #44685
  • Blazor JSDisconnectedException caught as AggregateException from TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException #44684
  • Problem details of headers and query parameters are reported as fields #44683
  • Windows Authentication not working in Kestrel running in Linux (Ubuntu) #44681
  • asp.net mvc returns wrong trace id in response body #44679
  • service-worker-assets wrong content when using StaticWebAssetBasePath in hosted scenario #44678
  • Incorrect OpenAPI schema generated for implicit services/special types/parseables #44677
  • Have chunk size as parameter for `DotNetStreamReference`. #44673
  • Blazor publish sometimes does not update compressed versions of linked files #44671
  • return error status while connected in blazor #44669

Closed

  • Blazor: @onchange event not working on input with type="datetime-local" in some browsers #24195
    Backlog
  • For Blazor Webassembly, display details of the error (message, stacktrace) within the blazor-error-ui element. #24108
    Backlog
  • Debug support for typescript inside a razor class library #23781
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server Side. JS doesn't start after a long downtime on mobile browsers. #23340
    Backlog
  • Automatically generated CRUD Razor Pages use bad layout #23113
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Enable docker support when creating a template from Visual Studio #22964
    Backlog
  • Blazor template that has core functionality in one project, server app in one project and client app in one project #23101
    Backlog
  • Avoid using HTML comment to describe root component in Blazor Server #22606
    Backlog
  • Blazor: suspicious CS8601 on nullable delegate/Func/Action component parameters #22488
    Backlog
  • Validation summary to show validation errors from all forms #22221
    Backlog
  • [Blazor|Mvc] Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.IComponentRenderer public #21666
    Backlog
  • Cannot use same razor page for two adress #34305
    Backlog
  • InputNumber: support for binding to all integral numeric types (byte, ushort, uint, etc.) #33293
    Backlog
  • Validation data/information for Model not added to Tag when using EditorFor() and EditorTemplates #35831
    Backlog
  • (Blazor) Append boolean to LocationChangedEventArgs indicating whether the navigation came from NavigationManager #38402
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] State manager for blazor maybe other #38665
    Backlog
  • Bad handling of complete logout in RemoteAuthenticatorViewCore.ProcessLogOutCallback #34990
    Backlog
  • RC2 has different behavior using developer certificates compared to RC1 and earlier #44651
  • ASP.Net Core 6 gRPC HTTP/2 client TLS problem. #44394
  • Blazor WASM Stale context rendered when updating context of a RenderFragment<T> with nested Tab content based on BlazorSamples #32803
    Backlog
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Why not save one more line with file-scoped namespaces? #44676
  • Blazor WASM not load LocalStorage or IndexedDB from IFrame #44587
  • Routing works when started Blazor Server started from outside but now when from XUnit tests #44628
  • [Blazor] Unexpected navigation behavior #44626

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve StringBuilder usage #44691
    Perf
  • Raise field size limit to 32kb #44689
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44688
    area-infrastructure
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) when possible #44687
    Perf
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2026865 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • fix trace id value #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fixed bug #19641 Routing ArgumentOutOfRangeException #44674
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Added configureConnection delegate to CircuitStartOptions #44623
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Child issue of #5382 - Commands bound with MenuBar items fail to execute after navigation due to the original BindingContext issue #10835
  • Error ADB0010: Mono.AndroidTools.InstallFailedException: Failure [INSTALL_FAILED_USER_RESTRICTED: Install canceled by user] #10829
  • TimePicker popup is not showing in Mac #10827
    Backlog
  • Commands do not Properly Enable Buttons in Release Builds (Android) #10825
    Backlog
  • Changing the root page when navigating crashes the application on Android #10824
  • SearchBar not expanding horizontally #10823
    Backlog
  • Maui Graphics need FillString/FillText APIs #10822
    Backlog
  • Maui Application running throws FileNotFoundException (iOS) #10821
  • Android - Collectionview EmptyView not visible #10819
    Backlog
  • WevView not allowing target="_blank" href redirects on Android #10818
    Backlog
  • Provide the equivalent of GetManifestResourceNames for MauiAsset files #10816
    Backlog
  • Issues With WebView Control and local Files #10814
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Windows] Connectivity changed on throws an exception and sometimes crashes the app #7393
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Maui jumps with the shell, and the Android input soft keyboard does not automatically close #10671
  • Second Window Crashes on Close #10708
  • [iOS] Crash when debugging with Hot Reload on local iPhone device after the splash screen disappear #10737
  • Issue with AndExpandLayoutManager in converted application #8816
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Test pr format #10831
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Update net6 workloads #10830
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add code format for PR's #10828
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add check to ensure measurement for AndExpandLayoutManager #10813
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix net7 branch with Analyzers fixes #10808
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix minimum sizing for * cells with multiple children #10836
  • Move init to mapper and move test components to reusable test runner library #10751
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasConversion is not used in the provider value comparer #29406
  • Static value objects causes InvalidOperationException when using the value object instead of primitive type in predicates #29405
  • Porting EF6 to EF Core: error "The LINQ expression could not be translated" reported in lots of queries #29404

Closed

  • Lazy Load Proxy loses the System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NullableAttribute from properties #29391
  • add-migration within VS Package Manager Console hangs due to Debug.Assert() (in own code) #29386
  • Configure an owned entity in order to have one to many relationship with an abstract class #29294
  • Remove-Migration Initialization String validation different from Add-Migration #29290
  • Json: allow customizing (some) serialization options when creating json, so that it's more readable #28815
  • Support for ValueGeneration OnUpdate #12611
  • How to delete the child rows via foreign key without loading navigation property? #29341

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #29289 - don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29407
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/Comet - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Don't find the runtime package for ios #269

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new sample listview #273
  • Fix dotnet build ios #272
